thread.section_title: Euro Car Parts Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Euro Car Parts | www.eurocarparts.com | 6 of 75
thread.title: Garry Stoneman
thread.title_full: Euro Car Parts reviewed by Garry Stoneman

author: Garry Stoneman
title: Garry Stoneman
text: Have used ECP for some time. Always been good value and a seamless ordering procedure. Recently ordered an item that had leaked in transit. Contacted their customer service team who responded very quickly with an offer of a no quibble free replacement. Excellent service from their customer service team and a great value item plus free shipping. Can't argue with that.
